mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bower, Daniel
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Rone Co., VA [Roane County, West Virginia]
Spencer, Roane Co., VA [Spencer, Rone County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bower, Daniel Patient Age: 45. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Piles [inflammed hemorroids]. Treatment: Cold water injections after each digestion. Stramonium [dried jimsonweed leaves] and nest gall ointment. Tonics and stimulants. . Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital at Parkersburg VA [West Virginia] 1864/09/27.
